attributes.action: Arm all SIA liceneced security guards
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: in an ever increasing dangerous soceity now full of previous eastern bloc immigrants it is a humble request that all store and site security guards be allowed to carry less lethal forms of defence such as batons, pepper spray and essentially hand cuffs for dealing with violent or dangerous members of the public. all too often guards have been subject to violent assaults as they have been out numbered with no means off defence or restraint.
